adDetails: Designer with over seven years of branding, concept design, and web visuals plus many more. Clients like Ooyala, Symantec, Hitachi, Apple, USGBC, and various others. Listed below is just a small amount of the work I can do, ask and I will gladly help with any type of design and budget! Send me your projects and I can help with any design, provide large amounts of work and I'll get you a great price! • Print and advertisements (flyers, business cards, brochures and banners). • Web graphics and icons ( digital images, app icons, mobile development). • Web layout, graphical design, website development. • Vector redraws and logo recreation. • Branding and series design. I've worked well through crazy deadlines and guidelines, email me if you'd like to discuss any particular projects and we can go from there! http://dribbble.com/alfredcollazo http://www.behance.net/alfredcollazo
